readKey.description: Provide the writeKey on the command line.

writeKey.description: Provide the readkey on the command line.

workingDirectory.description: Set the working directory that all paths are relative to.

dryRun.description: Do not perform the actual operation, only simulate the process. No files are uploaded nor written.

quite.description: Quiet mode. Print only important information.

force.description: Force the upload operation if the validation step fails.

tag.description: Perform the operation for the given release tag.

extractTarget.description: The target that extracts or generate the translation source file.
